segments.text: She is really pretty , isn't she ? Her skin looks so baby-smooth !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it's just that she put a lot of makeup on her face . Actually , natural beauty comes from within .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah , I can smell jealousy in the air .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She has nothing that deserves my jealousy . I don't have to put things on my face and I still look pretty . Don't you think so ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , right . But what did you put on your face last night ? Those little greenish things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They are cucumbers . They are natural skin soothers , natural healers of the skin.Haven ' t you heard them say on TV that ... eh ... they soften the skin , wipe out the roughness , counter irritation and build strength and resilience ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , yeah , yeah ! They wipe out tight , tired feelings and remove lines and age signs . Blah , blah ... See , I can even recite it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . You have learned a lot , haven't you ?
segments.speaker: S2
